title: Coronavirus Panic Returns | Guests: John Ziegler & Bob Woodson | 6/26/20
description:
New York state leads the world in coronavirus deaths per million – when compared to countries! Actress Kristen Bell has apologized for playing a mixed-race cartoon character. If the Star-Spangled Banner is canceled too, Glenn has some suggestions for a new anthem. Mediaite senior columnist John Ziegler discusses how "hate crime hoaxes" are their own genre of news and how Bubba Wallace’s noose story fits in. Jason Buttrill brings the latest on Black Lives Matter affiliate Thousand Currents: After Glenn exposed one of its leaders as a former terrorist, the board of directors page has mysteriously disappeared. Bob Woodson returns to discuss how the 1776 Unites campaign is reviving the history that black Americans are losing.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
